message:
Hi Purnima,

Sorry that your comment got lost in the moderation queue! I found it just now.

In this case, the portwble TFM is in the imports. Imports are a way of telling netcore that you want to be able to use libraries for that framework. Imports are dangerous because if a portable library tries to use something in that framework that is not on the machine running your app, it will fail. However, imports are also necessary for a while, until library developers all support netcore.
